ecom-faq-page.textcontent_jiccubmcd7i_html: Welcome to the IFL Watches FAQ page, designed to provide you with answers to your most common queries. Here, we've compiled insights on order management, payment options, shipping details, and more to guide you efficiently through our services. We value your time and strive to make your experience with us as seamless as possible. Our goal is to ensure that you have all the information you need to shop with confidence and enjoy your IFL experience to the fullest.

ecom-about-page.headingtext_78r7fv743c4_html: Our Story: Elevating Timekeeping with Art, Craftsmanship, and Individuality
ecom-about-page.textcontent_c143jv82hr_html: IFL Watches—Where every piece tells a story. Discover our world, where watches, accessories, and art unite to express the bold spirit within you. Here, every style, every dream, and every vision finds a home. <font color="#40bec1">Embrace uniqueness, defy norms, and join us in celebrating the art of being extraordinary.</font>
ecom-about-page.textcontent_tk9no2knfp_html:
In a world where uniqueness often gets overshadowed by the mainstream, IFL Watches was born from a passion to defy the ordinary—to celebrate the individuality that makes each of us extraordinary, ignited by the desire to fuse artistry with personal expression. Founded by Karar Aimer, IFL Watches emerged from a vision to redefine the essence of timekeeping. Here, the passion for horology goes beyond traditional limits, transforming every timepiece into a canvas that paints a journey, echoing the individuality of its wearer, one wrist at a time.

At IFL Watches, we are driven by the belief that everyone has a unique story to tell, and through our watches, accessories, and art, we aim to empower you to tell yours. We are storytellers, innovators, and believers in the power of standing out.
ecom-about-page.headingtext_q4cf6m6gtim_html: Where artistry, innovation, and your story become one
ecom-about-page.textcontent_da7c6iev1ia_html: <font color="#40bec1">Each IFL creation is a rebellion against the ordinary. </font>Our watches, accessories, and art pieces are canvases for expression, designed to celebrate your unique flair. With innovation at our core, we continually push boundaries to infuse each item with creativity, artistry, and soul.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: We rally the daring spirits—those who boldly pursue their purpose and the audacity to be distinct. Together we ignite change, one courageous dreamer at a time.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: Ideas take flight, unbound by convention. We are the artists, the innovators, and the dreamers who paint the world with our own vibrant hues.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: Life is too short for monotony. We believe in the serious business of infusing fun into every design we create, reflecting the lighter side of life and the joy of discovery.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: In a world of conformity, standing out is our credo. We break the mold, embrace the extraordinary, and celebrate the flavors that make us unique.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_4_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: Perfection in every tick, dedication in every tock. Our relentless quest for excellence ensures you receive nothing but the best.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_5_ecomhdq5tgmclmm_hdq5tg: A relentless cycle of breakthroughs and brilliance. We thrive on transforming the unprecedented into the unforgettable, again and again.
ecom-about-page.headingtext_s61k33ipjos_html: Custom Watches, Handcrafted Accessories, Inspired Art
ecom-about-page.textcontent_kxjqvqypj0f_html: <font color="#40bec1">At IFL Watches, every design begins with a story. </font>Our array of custom bespoke timepieces, artisan-crafted accessories and art embodies the essence of our brand—transforming ordinary moments into extraordinary tales of style and imagination. Each piece, a celebration of artistry and individual vision, invites you to leave a personal mark on the canvas of time.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomeepozo62liq_eepozo: Venture into a gallery of wearable art with limited edition and select line of customized watches. Celebrating both artistry and individuality, this collection showcases the unique IFL design ethos and offers designs that resonate with those who appreciate the beauty of detailed craftsmanship and the story behind every brushstroke.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomeepozo62liq_eepozo: Create a wearable masterpiece with our bespoke watch customization service. Here, your vision comes to life, tailored precisely to your desires. Every piece is a fusion of your dreams and our craftsmanship, not just ticking, making a statement.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomeepozo62liq_eepozo: Beyond timekeeping, we offer a selection of accessories, each created with the same commitment to creativity and uniqueness. From exclusive leather pouches to artisanal watch cases, every accessory is a tribute to your unparalleled style.
ecom-about-page.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomeepozo62liq_eepozo: Our collaborations with global artists and craftsmen bring forth a collection of art that transcends the ordinary. These pieces, ranging from the traditional to the contemporary, reflect the boundless creativity that fuels our brand and our circle of enthusiasts.
ecom-about-page.textcontent_xr8t68htnm_html: Welcome to a world where your style finds its perfect match in our creations. Here, every choice you make celebrates the art of fine craftsmanship, drawing you into a community that cherishes uniqueness and quality at every turn. <font color="#40bec1">With IFL, the time is yours to define.</font>

ecom-contact-page.headingtext_bgvug4yceic_html: Begin Your Timeless Conversation with Us
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_ajkq0nj6pb_html: Welcome to IFL Watches' contact page, where your thoughts, ideas, and inquiries take center stage. Here, every message is an opportunity to explore possibilities, craft bespoke experiences, and connect deeply. Whether you're dreaming of a custom timepiece or seeking answers, you've come to the right place. Our team is ready to embark on this journey together with you.
ecom-contact-page.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomsrneima03hi_srneim: Drop us a message at contact@iflwatches.com. We promise a response within 24 hours, ensuring your inquiry is met with our attentive care.
ecom-contact-page.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomsrneima03hi_srneim: Dreaming of a custom design? Connect with us at bespoke@iflwatches.com. Discover more about our bespoke journey here and start tailoring your vision into reality.
ecom-contact-page.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomsrneima03hi_srneim: Call us for prompt assistance at +44 20 8098 2880. Available Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm CET/CEST, ready to support you with the information and guidance you seek.
ecom-contact-page.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomsrneima03hi_srneim:
For those who prefer to reach out through post, our doors are always open to your letters and parcels. 

IFL Watches AB,
Johannesfredsvägen 12,
16869 Bromma, Sweden
ecom-contact-page.item_title_0_4sc8bzn0ath_html: What payment methods do you accept?
ecom-contact-page.item_title_1_4sc8bzn0ath_html: How long does it take to receive my order?
ecom-contact-page.item_title_3_4sc8bzn0ath_html: How do I track my order?
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_ip0l460grsk_html:
We offer a variety of payment options for your convenience:
Major Credit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express
Payment Services: Apple Pay
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_exs7akf5m9w_html: Shipping times vary depending on your location, but generally range from 1 to 5 business days. We ship worldwide using DHL Worldwide Express, ensuring the fastest available services. For specifics on shipping times and costs, our Shipping Policy page has all the details you need.
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_i75324hg01_html: All items purchased from IFL come with a 2-year warranty from the date of purchase. This warranty diligently covers any manufacturer defects, ensuring your peace of mind as you enjoy our creations. Please be aware, the warranty doesn't cover normal wear and tear.
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_t8aiuaraa4c_html:
Have more questions or looking for further details? 
We invite you to visit our full FAQ page for a deeper dive into all things IFL. Our extensive resource covers a wide range of topics to help you find the answers you need quickly and easily. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to reach out ⌚❤️
ecom-contact-page.headingtext_1yualju5uif_html: Flavor Your Time with IFL Vibes
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_l51woccg6m_html: We believe that the love for timepieces is best enjoyed together. We're inviting you to join our IFL Watches Family and become part of a community that shares your passion.
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_nn92865ncll_html: Sign up for our newsletter and enjoy a 10% off on our  accessories and non-limited CasiOaks, as a warm welcome. Stay up-to-date with the latest releases, enjoy exclusive content, and connect with fellow watch lovers. Join us, and let's celebrate the art of timekeeping together⌚️🎉✨.
ecom-contact-page.textcontent_exvdxp7asv_html:
<font color="#40bec1"></font>At IFL Watches, every interaction is a thread in the tapestry of our story, a story enriched by the voices and visions of our remarkable community. Whether you're seeking to create, inquire, or explore, know that no question is too small, no dream too vast. 
We stand ready to guide, inspire, and walk alongside you on your journey with us, every step of the way. <font color="#40bec1">Reach out, let's make time count.</font>

ecom-limited-edition-page.headingtext_yqx51jtsgha_html: Reserve Priority Access for the Upcoming Limited Edition Revelation
ecom-limited-edition-page.textcontent_ypkym4objoo_html: Escape the mainstream and align with the remarkable. By subscribing, you position yourself at the forefront of horological innovation, ensuring you're among the first to witness our next avant-garde creation. Past legends sold out in a blink – don't let the next masterpiece slip through your grasp.
ecom-limited-edition-page.headingtext_fianhmoxi0g_html: While the world awaits our next limited creation, indulge in the curated elegance of our distinct collections.

ecom-limited-edition-thank-you-page.headingtext_aadypebi1ar_html: Thank You for Opting Out of Ordinary!
ecom-limited-edition-thank-you-page.textcontent_savcjqim1u_html: Your taste for the extraordinary has been noted! We're thrilled to have you on board.
ecom-limited-edition-thank-you-page.textcontent_cfa7dpgcde_html:
As the next chapter of IFL unveils, we promise to serve you nothing short of spectacular. Here's to celebrating the bold, one tick at a time!

Explore our curated collections and unveil our top-notch bestsellers. Discover the timepiece that doesn't just tick but resonates with your unique flair. And while you're at it, don't miss our artisan-crafted accessories — the finishing touch that takes your watch from statement to anthem.
ecom-limited-edition-thank-you-page.headingtext_b934zdne0i7_html: Date will appear here when available. Stay tuned.

ecom-thank-you-bespoke-inquiry-page.headingtext_takaehmqud_html: Hello and welcome to IFL Watches!
ecom-thank-you-bespoke-inquiry-page.textcontent_dl0riamdl7g_html: We're delighted to have received your inquiry about a bespoke timepiece. Your interest in a custom design is important to us, and we are keen to explore your ideas further.
ecom-thank-you-bespoke-inquiry-page.textcontent_lo8pwe81x4_html: Our team is currently reviewing your submission. We will be in contact with you soon to delve deeper into your vision and discuss how we might assist in shaping it.
ecom-thank-you-bespoke-inquiry-page.textcontent_jn95rrk5k6o_html: While you wait, we invite you to continue exploring our exclusive collections and stories on our website. Should you wish to add any more details to your initial inquiry or have any questions, please feel free to reach out at bespoke@iflwatches.com.

ecom-bespoke-watches-page.headingtext_4jmxy5r9l8s_html: Not Just a Watch, Your Watch.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_1f7km0kl775_html: Bespoke timepieces, uniquely hand-painted, designed to resonate with the essence of your team, organization, or club. Wearing a shared design not only reflects your collective identity but also deepens the bond among members. It's more than just a watch – it's a testament to unity, individuality, and a shared journey.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_fqwnyyhvjpr_html: Hand-painted dials, intricate designs, and Swedish craftsmanship come together in our Stockholm studio. Whether you're seeking to embody a legacy, make a statement, or simply cherish artistry, every watch tells a story – your story. Dive into a watchmaking process that's collaborative, creative, and truly bespoke.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.headingtext_91t5ac0ayq_html: A Tribute to the Swedish National Team by IFL
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.headingtext_rt6i44xqj2m_html: Echoing Stadium Cheers with Every Tick
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.headingtext_nyj71ga101_html: Sweden's Sporting Legacy on a Wrist
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_gh9iitl2i7_html: Sweden is a nation known for its design innovation and timeless appeal, and our collaboration with the Swedish National Team aimed to capture the essence of Sweden in a wristwatch.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_6bvq38dntrf_html:
Each index is meticulously painted in blue and yellow, echoing the iconic hues of the Swedish national flag. The artistry doesn't stop there; abstract pointillism adorns the watch face, employing the same patriotic palette. The deep blue bezel, smooth and immaculate, presents an ideal canvas for contrasting yellow text that stands out with both subtlety and clarity. 

Each watch we design speaks of a narrative, and this timepiece tells a story of national pride, athleticism, and unwavering determination. We are deeply honored to have had this opportunity, and it remains a highlight in our bespoke journey.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_1_vhqje8tq7t_html: Can I bring my own watch design or do I have to select from your models?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_2_vhqje8tq7t_html: I’m part of an organization. Can we get watches tailored for our team?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_3_vhqje8tq7t_html: Where are the watches designed and assembled?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_4_vhqje8tq7t_html: How long does it typically take to get my bespoke watch?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_6_vhqje8tq7t_html: I have a unique customization idea not mentioned on your site. Can you make it happen?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_7_vhqje8tq7t_html: How do I start my bespoke watch journey?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_8_vhqje8tq7t_html: Are there any minimum order requirements?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.item_title_9_vhqje8tq7t_html: How can I contact you for any queries or assistance?
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_iir0xbtr8i_html: A bespoke watch is a customized and hand-painted timepiece, uniquely tailored and crafted to reflect your personal tastes and needs.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_aiqlo9288yg_html: You're welcome to introduce us to your unique vision. While we offer a range of models to choose from, we're open to external designs and are eager to collaborate to bring your vision to life.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_g4oqycht15_html: Absolutely! We've had the honor of customizing watches for groups, including esteemed organizations like the Swedish Football National Team. Share your requirements, and we'll craft timepieces that resonate with your team's spirit.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_m5p45ag9uzs_html: All our bespoke watches are designed and assembled in our Stockholm studio, Sweden, by a dedicated team of designers, artists, painters, and certified watchmakers.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_ql081yx52st_html: The bespoke process is intricate, often requiring several weeks from design initiation to final assembly. The exact duration may vary depending on the complexity of your design and requirements.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_lmgtnhurjml_html: Yes, we ship our bespoke watches worldwide. We work with recognized carriers such as DHL and FedEx to ensure safe and prompt delivery.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_pnipndyce2_html: Absolutely! We're always excited to take on new challenges and turn unique ideas into horological reality. Share your distinctive vision with us, and we'll explore how to best bring it to life.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_khqzc5vtik_html: Simply fill out our bespoke form, sharing your vision, design preferences, or inspiration. Our team will get in touch to guide you through the next steps.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.textcontent_ibg124r6h_html: For bespoke projects, especially those tailored for teams or organizations, there's a minimum order quantity of 25 watches.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom9y6xcddjbej_9y6xcd: Start by selecting a model from our collection. Alternatively, introduce us to your unique vision. Our portfolio can serve as a muse for your creativity.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom9y6xcddjbej_9y6xcd: Engage in an in-depth consultation where we intertwine your narrative with the intricate details of the watch.
ecom-bespoke-watches-page.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom9y6xcddjbej_9y6xcd: Certified watchmakers disassemble the watch. Skilled artists breathe life into it, infusing their creativity. ecom-iflw-casioak-features-bt-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom5m543d8sikt_5m543d:
Format: 12/24-hour

Alarm: 5 daily alarms
Time Signal: Hourly time signal
Calendar: Full auto-calendar (to year 2099)
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-bt-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom5m543d8sikt_5m543d:

Range: 60 minutes
Start Time Setting Range: 1 second to 60 minutes (1-second increments and 1-minute increments)
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-bt-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom5m543d8sikt_5m543d:

Measuring Modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-bt-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom5m543d8sikt_5m543d:

Color: White

ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_cjzyng4z0x_html: Elevate Your Style, Embrace Your Uniqueness. Step into a world where your choices in watches, accessories, and art reflect the bold and creative spirit within you.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_80578wkxibu_html: At IFL Watches, we transcend beyond timepieces to offer a realm where art, craftsmanship, and individual expression converge. Our collection, ranging from bespoke watches to handcrafted accessories and artwork, is designed for the bold, the creative, and the unique. Each piece is a celebration of your personal style, a testament to our commitment to elevating your uniqueness.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomdkiv1lskydd_dkiv1l: Tailor-made timepieces for teams, and organizations, reflecting your collective spirit and vision.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomdkiv1lskydd_dkiv1l: Choose from limited editions or go beyond with our custom watch options, ensuring your watch is as unique as you are.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomdkiv1lskydd_dkiv1l: Each accessory and piece of art we offer is a masterpiece, handcrafted and hand-painted to add sophistication to your collection.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomdkiv1lskydd_dkiv1l: Our designs are a melange of international creativity and craftsmanship, uniting diverse artistic perspectives to create pieces that shine in any setting.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_4_ecomdkiv1lskydd_dkiv1l: We're dedicated to elevating your journey with us, ensuring every interaction adds value to your unique story.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_tjsjdx4krj_html: In the world of IFL Watches, creativity knows no bounds. From hand-painted dials to bespoke designs, our offerings are as diverse as our clientele. We celebrate the mavericks, the trendsetters, and everyone who dares to be different.
ecom-default-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ey3nyg8gja_html:
We believe in the power of personal expression. Our services are tailored to reflect your unique tastes and preferences, ensuring that what you wear isn't just a timepiece or accessory, but a symbol of your distinct identity.

Our commitment to you goes beyond providing exceptional products. We're here to elevate your experience, making sure every IFL piece you choose adds a touch of extraordinary to your everyday life. Where others see accessories, we see expressions of individuality; where some see watches, we see canvases for creativity.

ecom-casioak-mini-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ctgw9wx1y1j_html: Discover the charm of compact sophistication with the CasiOak Mini Collection, where intricate design converges with playful elegance, crafting a timepiece experience tailored for the trendsetter in everyone.
ecom-casioak-mini-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_kyx0yxk5ws_html: Introducing the CasiOak Mini Collection by IFL Watches – a range that reimagines the iconic CasiOak design for slender wrists. These timepieces, hand-painted with meticulous care in our Stockholm studio, offer a perfect fit for those seeking a more compact, lightweight, and unisex option. The Mini CasiOak, with its 43 mm case, retains all the resilience and style of its larger counterpart but in a form that's as elegant as it is enduring. Perfect for every wrist, this collection is an invitation to experience luxury in a size that suits you.
ecom-casioak-mini-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_wmis0zlv84l_html: The CasiOak Mini Series stands as a testament to our philosophy that style should be inclusive. These watches, weighing just 41g, offer a lighter, yet equally robust alternative to traditional models. The playfulness of the hand-painted designs in vibrant or subtle hues brings a unique charm to each piece. Whether you're drawn to the striking Coral Reef or the understated Latte Rainbow, the Mini Collection offers a spectrum of styles to reflect your personal taste. These timepieces are not just about telling time; they're about celebrating individuality in a size that's accessible to all.
ecom-casioak-mini-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_71n59vnzrrx_html: The CasiOak Mini Collection masterfully balances functionality with an exquisite fit, presenting a design that's both delicate and robust, ideally suited for slender wrists. Each watch's shock and water resistance ensure that elegance doesn't come at the expense of endurance. Owning a CasiOak Mini means embracing a watch that's as functional as it is fashionable, a rare gem that elevates your style while ensuring comfort and durability. With the CasiOak Mini, you're not just choosing a watch; you're choosing a piece of art that fits perfectly into your life and style.

ecom-casioak-sky-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_phfwipqfx7_html: Elevate Your Wrist with the Hue of the Sky
ecom-casioak-sky-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_6fqhxf5lc8c_html: Step into the serene world of the CasiOak Sky Collection, where the tranquil beauty of the blue sky is captured in every timepiece, offering a slice of heaven on your wrist.
ecom-casioak-sky-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_tmu9ce3rpc_html: The CasiOak Sky Collection embodies the majestic allure of the sky's infinite blue, transforming it into a wearable expression of calm and serenity. This line of watches, adorned in various shades of blue, mirrors the tranquil and awe-inspiring hues of the sky above. Hand-painted dials and intricate details ensure each piece is not just a timekeeper, but a masterpiece, reflecting the boundless beauty of the sky.
ecom-casioak-sky-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_eka7drm0ovm_html: Embracing the CasiOak Sky Collection is like wearing a piece of the sky itself. Each watch, robust in design and rich in detail, is crafted to withstand the rigors of everyday life while maintaining an aesthetic that soothes and inspires. The collection's shock and water resistance are testaments to its durability, ensuring these timepieces are as reliable as they are beautiful. The vibrant blue color scheme isn’t just a choice; it's an invitation to carry the calmness and depth of the sky wherever you go, making every moment a reflection of nature's tranquil beauty.
ecom-casioak-sky-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_8gxvm5s8enw_html:
In the CasiOak Sky Collection, form meets function in a symphony of color and craftsmanship. Each watch is more than a timepiece; it’s a personal statement, a celebration of individual style and preference. The collection offers a perfect blend of advanced features and stunning design, appealing to both the discerning collector and the style-conscious individual. 

 Owning a piece from the CasiOak Sky Collection is not just about keeping time; it's about cherishing everlasting beauty of the blue hues and making a statement that resonates with your personal narrative and style.

ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_ill33uwpkv_html: A Fusion of Abstract and Accuracy
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_du1v9qkm0r4_html: Experience the vibrant fusion of watch elegance and abstract artistry, captured in unique creations on carbonfiber canvas, where each stroke weaves a narrative of time and imagination.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_sihm21fdd08_html: Delve into the unique artistic realm of Katy Barnfield, a collaboration that brings together the precision of watchmaking with the boundless creativity of abstract pointillism. Katy's artworks, including the renowned RM68 Graffiti, are a testament to her innovative approach, combining carbon fiber and resin to create pieces that exude a high gloss, 3D-like quality. These limited-production masterpieces are more than just wall art; they are a celebration of the fusion between contemporary art and classic timepieces, designed to captivate and inspire.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom4dqnd34ugbm_4dqnd3: Each piece is handcrafted on a carbonfiber canvas, offering a unique, high-gloss, and 3D-like visual experience.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom4dqnd34ugbm_4dqnd3: Exclusive and limited in number, ensuring that each piece is as unique as the collector’s own story.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom4dqnd34ugbm_4dqnd3: Katy's distinctive style blends abstract art with watch-inspired themes, creating a captivating visual narrative.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom4dqnd34ugbm_4dqnd3: Utilizing a groundbreaking blend of carbon fiber and resin, Katy Barnfield's art stands out with its stunning finish and depth.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_et3bdzdb94o_html: Katy Barnfield's collaboration with IFL Watches unfolds as a vibrant tapestry of abstract art, each piece a representation of exquisite wall art. Each piece tells a story, drawing inspiration from high-end watch models and reinterpreting them with a unique artistic lens. Owning a Katy Barnfield original is not just an investment in art; it's an immersion into a world where the boundaries between timekeeping and abstract art blur, creating a space that resonates with watch enthusiasts and art lovers alike.
ecom-katy-barnfield-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_8su11af5rii_html:
Integrating a Katy Barnfield masterpiece into your space is an invitation to embrace both the unconventional and the sublime. Her artworks transform any room into a gallery of modern expression, where the passion for watches transcends the conventional, morphing into a vibrant display of color and form. 

Each creation is a conversation piece, a statement of your appreciation for innovative art and a passion for timekeeping, making it the perfect centerpiece for any home or office seeking to showcase a love for watches in a unique and artistic manner.

ecom-mrartpride-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_xjbmvu7jje_html: Delve into the audacious and vivid world of MrArtPride, where each canvas bursts with a dynamic fusion of pop culture, vibrant hues, and provocative themes, intertwining the essence of watchmaking with audacious artistry.
ecom-mrartpride-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_wshi5j7y77d_html: In the vibrant and expressive universe of MrArtPride, artistic bravery and visual storytelling converge. Merging oil paint with media art, a self-taught visionary crafts pieces that are not just visually striking but also rich in irony and sarcasm. His creations offer more than aesthetic appeal; they are powerful narratives that challenge the norms, making each piece a statement of rebellion and extravagance. ecom-mrartpride-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_4_ecom020pfie9gyr9_020pf: Merging the art of watchmaking with contemporary themes, these pieces are conversation starters, evoking thoughts and discussions.

Each piece is a tribute to the artist's fearless approach to exploring and expressing themes of diversity, identity, and pop culture. Owning a MrArtPride artwork means embracing art that doesn't just adorn a space but transforms it, encouraging viewers to ponder and appreciate the unconventional beauty and complexity of the human experience. ecom-casioak-banana-split-ld-block.textcontent_6mf6unw4tb5_html: Indulge in the G-Shock CasiOak Banana Split Limited Edition, where the zest of playful design meets the reliability of seasoned craftsmanship. ecom-casioak-banana-split-ld-block.textcontent_lds48kx701b_html:
The G-Shock CasiOak Banana Split Limited Edition is a wearable art that begins with the meticulous hand of an artist. ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_nyi79fn0gg_html: Embark on an enchanting journey into the heart of timekeeping with the Pendulux Collection. Here, you'll discover a world where historical inspiration gracefully meets contemporary sophistication. Witness how each piece tells its own story, inviting you to explore the delicate balance between past and present in the art of horology.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_fx52e44ypbo_html: The Pendulux Collection invites you on a nostalgic odyssey, featuring a range of clocks inspired by seminal moments in history—from the audacious endeavors of World War II to the pioneering days of space exploration and the ingenious sketches of Leonardo Da Vinci. Each timepiece in this collection is more than a mere clock; it's a narrative, a piece of history, eloquently encapsulating the essence of time within a modern context.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom37yn281evd8_37yn28: Every clock is a testament to the art and science of clockmaking, meticulously crafted by hand, ensuring no detail is overlooked.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom37yn281evd8_37yn28: Utilizing materials like solid brass, nickel, and high-grade aluminum, each piece resonates with the authenticity and rugged elegance of eras gone by.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom37yn281evd8_37yn28: From the audacity of a rocket ship to the grace of 1930s maritime, each design in the collection is distinct, imbuing both purpose and passion into its form.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom37yn281evd8_37yn28: These artisan clocks blend traditional artistry with modern functionality, offering a sophisticated addition to today’s interiors.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_jz6kostpmuh_html: The Pendulux Collection stands out as a custodian of time-honored designs, preserving the authenticity of vintage aesthetics. Each table clock, be it a tribute to the golden era of steamboats or a nod to the groundbreaking designs of 1950s rocket ships, is carefully curated to echo the rich history of its inspiration while resonating with contemporary tastes and preferences.
ecom-pendulux-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_o0d9qr95h_html: Owning a piece from the Pendulux Collection is more than an acquisition; it's an embrace of history and craft. Whether it's the Steamboat Table Clock, with its operable brass steam piston, or the Thunderbolt Table Clock, inspired by 1940s fighter planes, each timepiece is a blend of nostalgia and functionality, destined to be a conversation starter and a prized possession in every home.

ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ley8oabm6a_html: Discover the perfect blend of functionality and fashion with the IFL Watch Pouch Collection. Designed to cater to the discerning tastes of watch enthusiasts, these pouches offer a stylish solution to protect and carry your treasured timepieces. Whether you're traveling or storing your watch at home, our pouches ensure your valuable accessory remains pristine and ready for any occasion.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_5mpqgnr8zdu_html: The IFL Watch Pouch stands as an emblem of sophistication and meticulous craftsmanship. Each piece marries the desire for practicality with the pursuit of elegance, offering a secure and stylish haven for your treasured timepieces. Crafted from the finest materials and designed to accommodate watches up to 48mm, these pouches reflect a deep understanding of the watch enthusiast's lifestyle. They serve not merely as protective cases but as a sophisticated complement to the discerning individual's daily ensemble and travel gear.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecommkunaut6zaa_mkunau: Designed to accommodate one watch up to 48mm, ensuring a snug and secure fit for both daily use and travel.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecommkunaut6zaa_mkunau: Each pouch includes a protective leather insert, wrapping your watch in a soft embrace to prevent scratches and damage.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecommkunaut6zaa_mkunau: Lovingly handcrafted by skilled artisans, featuring a plush suede leather interior and a distinguished leather exterior, promising refined elegance for each item.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecommkunaut6zaa_mkunau: A discreet snap button ensures your watch is securely enclosed, blending safety with sleek design for a seamless look.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_e3kao4svb06_html: The IFL Watch Pouch Collection is more than just an accessory; it's a celebration of your passion for watches. Each pouch is designed with the watch enthusiast in mind, offering a stylish and secure home for your timepiece, whether on the move or at rest. Available in a variety of colors, these pouches are a statement of your personal style, promising to keep your watch safe and your fashion sense sharp.
ecom-watch-pouches-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_2ms5ym4k8at_html: Understanding the needs of the modern watch owner, the IFL Watches Watch Pouch Collection seamlessly integrates into your lifestyle. Its slim design not only protects but also adds an element of elegance to your travel essentials, ensuring you make a statement wherever you go. This collection is a tribute to those who appreciate the finer details in life, offering a practical yet beautiful solution for watch care and storage.

ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_vfuvembfh0b_html: Introducing the Eaton Watch Cases, a vibrant testament to safeguarding your timepieces with flair. Designed to hold up to three watches, these cases merge superior protection with our signature colorful expression. Crafted for those who value both security and aesthetics, each case is a celebration of innovative design and functional elegance.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_x16z9v6rdqg_html: In the realm of watch care, the Eaton Watch Cases redefine the concept of protection. Encased in soft Alcantara® interior and secured with high-quality aluminum locks, these cases  safeguard your timepieces and elevate the entire experience of watch storage. With removable cushions to cater to different watch sizes and preferences, each case is meticulously designed for the dynamic lifestyle of the modern watch enthusiast. Embodying the adventurous spirit of IFL and the sleek craftsmanship of Charles Simon, this collection invites you to infuse your watch protection routine with a splash of elegance and color.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomytmvhrpz2y_ytmvhrp: Each case is a bold statement in safeguarding your watches, featuring a high-quality aluminum lock for sleek, reliable protection.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomytmvhrpz2y_ytmvhrp: The Alcantara® interior provides a gentle nest for your timepieces, ensuring they remain scratch-free and pampered.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomytmvhrpz2y_ytmvhrp: With removable cushions, adapt the space to fit watches of various sizes, securing each piece in tailored comfort.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomytmvhrpz2y_ytmvhrp: Born from a unique collaboration between IFL Watches and Charles Simon, these cases boast exclusive color combinations, adding a personalized touch to your collection.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_4_ecomytmvhrpz2y_ytmvhrp: Designed for both journey and home, the compact and durable construction ensures your watches stay protected wherever you go.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_92ltumz639_html: The Eaton Watch Case collection brings a new dimension to watch care, blending the meticulous engineering of Charles Simon with the exuberant palette of IFL Watches. This partnership celebrates the fusion of functionality with aesthetic pleasure, ensuring that your watches are not just stored, but are enveloped in a case that reflects your personality and style. It's an invitation to experience watch care as an extension of your individuality, where protection is rendered through a lens of fun and color.
ecom-eaton-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_085s3jkas43h_html:
This collaboration is a heartfelt tribute to the profound love of horology and the distinct pleasure derived from expressing oneself through thoughtfully chosen accessories. The Eaton Watch Cases emerge as a radiant celebration of this deep-seated passion, meticulously designed to offer both a secure and stylish sanctuary for your most cherished timepieces.

Crafted with the modern connoisseur in mind, these cases represent a seamless merger of safety and aesthetics, ensuring that conscientious watch care doesn't necessitate a sacrifice of personal flair. This collection, a product of dedicated craftsmanship and innovative design, is inspired by the dynamic interplay of color, texture, and functionality. It stands as a testament to the belief that protection for your watches should be as distinctive and expressive as the pieces themselves.

ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_77jxubgm4j2_html: Step into the limelight with the IFL Camo Watch Rolls Collection, where fashion meets function in a vivid celebration of style. Encased in the boldness of resilient Saffiano leather, these watch rolls boast an IFL-exclusive Camouflage pattern, offering a splash of color and a dash of daring to your watch display.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_4hynldioax_html: Presenting your watches in a protective embrace that's as daring as your personal taste, the IFL Camo Watch Rolls Collection is a testament to playful sophistication. Available for one, two, or four watches, each roll is a masterpiece of artisanal skill, featuring a plush Alcantara® interior for a touch of opulence. The collection's distinctive Camo pattern makes a statement of bold self-expression, catering to those who confidently display their vibrant side.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom4vz5o206s4_4vz5o20: Crafted with the modern maverick in mind, each roll is an expression of IFL's fearless aesthetic.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom4vz5o206s4_4vz5o20: A bold and bright spin on traditional camouflage, celebrating the wearer's love for the unconventional.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom4vz5o206s4_4vz5o20: Capable of cradling a range of timepiece sizes, these rolls are as versatile as they are striking.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom4vz5o206s4_4vz5o20: Equipped with robust snap buttons, every watch is held securely, ensuring peace of mind with a pop of color.
ecom-camo-watch-rolls-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_s2ppbdftlzi_html: With each Camo Watch Roll from IFL, you get more than just a storage solution; you receive a piece of artful ingenuity. The high-strength Saffiano leather, known for its durability and texture, is contrasted beautifully by the softness of the Alcantara® lining, making every insertion or removal of your watches a luxurious experience. The collection caters to diverse preferences, with each variant from the vivacious orange to the electrifying blue echoing a facet of your personality.

ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_4us4i8zvwub_html: Step right up to the playful world of Robotoy Watch Stands, where keeping time is never a dull moment! Say goodbye to the staid and the mundane; these robotic rascals are programmed for fun, ready to give your precious timepieces a lively lift with adjustable antics and a can-do attitude.
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_xhzfzajfn1f_html: Enter the cheerful realm of Robotoy Watch Stands, the ultimate fusion of art, play, and practicality. "Why so serious?" they seem to ask as they strike a pose on your desk or bedside table. Handmade with joy by the one and only Mr. Choi from an array of materials that tickle the fancy, these robotic buddies are not just about holding your watch—they're about bringing a smile to your face every moment of the day. So go on, adjust their arms for a high-five or set their legs in a moonwalk; with Robotoys, it's always playtime!
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom84xdx7j1ul_84xdx7j: Bend those knees and flex those arms! Every Robotoy is fully posable for a personalized touch of playfulness.
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom84xdx7j1ul_84xdx7j: Crafted with a dash of humor and a whole lot of heart, these stands are no joke when it comes to quality.
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom84xdx7j1ul_84xdx7j: Made from sturdy wire, copper, and acrylics, these little jesters are seriously dedicated to holding your watch – no clowning around.
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom84xdx7j1ul_84xdx7j: Each stand is a playful poke at the ordinary, turning your watch display into a source of endless entertainment.
ecom-robotoys-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ns6ei9qvmc9_html:
Who says timekeeping had to be all work and no play? With Robotoy Watch Stands, your timepiece doesn't just sit there—it takes center stage in a performance of playful poise and personality! Each Robotoy is an entertainer at heart, ready to add a punchline to the precision of timekeeping. Stand back and watch as they transform the simple act of holding your watch into a spectacle of charm and character. 

So, why settle for the ordinary when you can have your time served with a side of spirit? Let Robotoy inspire every glance at your watch to be an encounter with joy, inviting a laugh, a grin, or even a moment of sheer delight.

ecom-casioak-spitfire-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_s0a0b0cxj_html: Elevate your ensemble with the G-Shock CasiOak Spitfire, a limited edition marvel that marries the robust ethos of G-Shock with the boundless spirit of the Spitfire. Designed for the modern aviator at heart, each watch is a canvas where the art of aviation is painted onto the march of time.
ecom-casioak-spitfire-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_62pwibtj9da_html:
The CasiOak Spitfire edition orchestrates a symphony of precision and passion, meticulously hand-crafted for those whose pulse quickens at the very thought of aviation's golden era. Adorned in the serene hues of the sky, each timepiece is a collector's aria, resonating with audacious charm and a legacy of horological craftsmanship. It embodies the spirit of the Spitfire, promising an impact as timeless as the silhouette it celebrates — a salute to the art of flight and the intrepid souls who have mastered the skies.

Ascend beyond the ordinary with the CasiOak Spitfire, limited to only 100 pieces worldwide. Each watch in this series is a hand-painted tribute to the thrill of flight, capturing the essence of aeronautical exploration and the joy of soaring through life's grand tapestry.
ecom-casioak-spitfire-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ur344rpe9vr_html:
The G-Shock CasiOak Spitfire stands as a testament to those who etch their trajectories across the heavens – a seamless blend of audacious design and sophisticated mechanics. Each dial is an epic of adventure, capturing the soul of the Spitfire with meticulous strokes that honor the heritage of aviation. It's a homage to spontaneous aerial escapades, where style is the compass and individuality the altitude.

This timepiece is a narrative of aerial ambition, crafted for the wearer who finds kinship with the dauntless spirit of aviators. It's an artifact for the modern-day maverick, a timekeeper that doesn't just tell time but also celebrates the relentless pursuit of freedom above the clouds.

ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_0lw6ok7d059_html: NT 8 GT Haute Horlogerie Skeleton Desk Clocks
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_8qtv1j3g5iu_html: A New Vision in Timekeeping Art
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_x24vba8m65h_html: Introducing the NT 8 GT Table Clock Collection – a masterpiece of horological engineering, where the art of traditional clockmaking is infused with modern aesthetics and innovation. Crafted with passion and precision by Matthias Naeschke, a name synonymous with unmatched craftsmanship and the pursuit of perfection in the realm of high horology.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_c7nka74u4wr_html: Within the heart of the NT 8 GT Table Clock Collection lies a harmonious fusion of heritage and innovation, meticulously brought to life by Matthias Naeschke. This collection stands as a beacon of horological excellence, featuring clocks that are a testament to the meticulous art of clockmaking. With bodies crafted from aluminium and glass, each piece in this collection marries the lightweight elegance of modern design with the timeless sophistication of traditional craftsmanship. The collection captivates with its unique features, such as the skeletonized chapter ring that elegantly captures time and the visually striking gear train inspired by the engineering prowess of luxury sports cars. It's an ode to those who appreciate the delicate balance between aesthetic beauty and mechanical precision, a true masterpiece of temporal artistry.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom7qxycfz3ylb_7qxycf: The openworked main plates, reminiscent of an airplane wing's filigree skeleton, showcase the clockwork in a mesmerizing display of precision, made possible by an aluminium alloy that combines strength with ethereal lightness.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom7qxycfz3ylb_7qxycf: Inspired by the filigree rims of exclusive sports cars, the contemporary spokes of the gear train are a marvel of engineering and design, offering a striking visual effect that’s both innovative and deeply bowled for an appealing mechanical vista.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom7qxycfz3ylb_7qxycf: Abandoning traditional numerals for a skeletonized chapter ring, this collection introduces a novel way to read time with precision through geometrically captured minute increments, ensuring every moment is marked with accuracy.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom7qxycfz3ylb_7qxycf: Encased in a blend of traditional blown-glass art and an aluminium base with decorative cranks for leveling, the NT 8 GT is as much a work of art as it is a precision timepiece, offering a harmonious balance of aesthetic delight and functional brilliance.
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_2kzbvw8csqp_html: Matthias Naeschke – The Heartbeat of Horological Heritage
ecom-nt-8-gt-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_6cnd8z52z4b_html: The NT 8 GT Table Clock Collection’s distinction was globally acknowledged when it garnered accolades at the Grand Prix d'Horlogerie de Genève (GPHG), often hailed as the Oscars of the watchmaking world. This honor highlights the collection's innovation, craftsmanship, and the extraordinary beauty that set it apart in the competitive realm of horology. Recognition by the GPHG not only celebrates the technical excellence and aesthetic appeal of the NT 8 GT but also affirms its significance within the intricate tapestry of timekeeping history. Such esteemed acknowledgment from the pinnacle of horological awards underscores the collection's role in pioneering a new chapter for the art of clockmaking, one where precision and design coalesce to captivate and inspire.

ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_1yxifs1b93q_html: Explore the universe in its awe-inspiring splendor with the Tsuyosa Galaxy Concept, a breathtaking vision of the cosmos realized on the esteemed Citizen Automatic. This limited edition masterpiece weaves the enchantment of the cosmos into a hand-painted dial, offering a slice of the universe tailored to adorn your wrist.
ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_jp3k9ukpyfs_html:
The Tsuyosa Galaxy Concept is a custom artistic celebration of the mysteries of the universe. Our artisans capture the magic of celestial bodies using the abstract pointillism technique, translating the galaxy's luminous hues onto the dial's canvas. Crafted from resilient enamels that maintain their stellar radiance over time, each unique artwork is a wearable vista of cosmic splendor. Meanwhile, Citizen's esteemed Japanese engineering provides a foundation of flawless precision for this astronomically inspired concept. The Tsuyosa Automatic's robust 40mm case and smooth sweeping second hand complement the dial's artistic expression of infinity.

A constellation of only 100 pieces worldwide, the Tsuyosa Galaxy Concept is as rare as a shooting star. This exclusive series offers watch aficionados and celestial dreamers alike the opportunity to own a slice of the universe, captured on the canvas of time.
ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecom64sbkeztyt3_64sbke: At its heart beats the Citizen caliber 8210 automatic movement, with 21 jewels and a rhythmic oscillation of 21,600 times per hour.
ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecom64sbkeztyt3_64sbke: Enclosed within a robust 40mm stainless steel case, this timepiece is both an armor against the elements and a vessel for the cosmos.
ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecom64sbkeztyt3_64sbke: Crafted with a sapphire crystal and water-resistant design, this timepiece is engineered to endure, just like the timeless cosmos it portrays.
ecom-tsuyosa-galaxy-ld-vanilla-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecom64sbkeztyt3_64sbke: With a 40-hour power reserve, the concept carries the enduring spirit of the universe, a constant companion in your exploration of time.

With every detail thoughtfully curated, these masterpieces are where art meets horology, capturing moments and turning them into timeless tales. ecom-iflw-casioak-features-block.ecomiconlistdes_0_ecomx5rzxwzuaw8_x5rzxw:
Format: 12/24-hour
Analog Timekeeping: 2 hands (hour, minute), 1 hand (day)
Digital Timekeeping: Hour, minute, second, pm, month, date
World Time: 31 time zones (48 cities + coordinated universal time), daylight saving on/off
Alarm: 5 daily alarms
Time Signal: Hourly time signal
Calendar: Full auto-calendar (to year 2099)
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-block.ecomiconlistdes_1_ecomx5rzxwzuaw8_x5rzxw:
Measuring Unit: 1 second
Range: 24 hours
Start Time Setting Range: 1 second to 24 hours (1-second increments, 1-minute increments, and 1-hour increments)
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-block.ecomiconlistdes_2_ecomx5rzxwzuaw8_x5rzxw:
Capacity: 1/100-second
Measuring Capacity: 00'00''00~59'59''99 (for the first 60 minutes), 1:00'00~23:59'59 (after 60 minutes)
Measuring Unit: 1/100 second (for the first 60 minutes), 1 second (after 60 minutes)
Measuring Modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
ecom-iflw-casioak-features-block.ecomiconlistdes_3_ecomx5rzxwzuaw8_x5rzxw:
Type: Double LED light
LED Light for the Face: Super illuminator, selectable illumination duration (1.5 seconds or 3 seconds), afterglow
LED Backlight for the Digital Display: Super illuminator, selectable illumination duration (1.5 seconds or 3 seconds), afterglow
Color: White

ecom-casioak-resin-ld-vanilla-block.headingtext_iopdx8v8a7c_html: Playful And Colorful Watches For Any Occasion
ecom-casioak-resin-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_cjv8jtejebr_html: Dive into the vibrant world of the CasiOak Collection, where art meets precision in a symphony of color and innovation.
ecom-casioak-resin-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_kud59cz4dcn_html: Unveiling the CasiOak Collection by IFL Watches – a spectacular series of G-Shock timepieces transformed into wearable art. Each watch in this collection, lovingly hand-painted in our Stockholm studio, embodies a unique blend of playful spirit and meticulous craftsmanship. These timepieces offer a pure, unadulterated watch experience that is as distinctive as it is reliable. With the CasiOak Collection, prepare to wear a masterpiece on your wrist.
ecom-casioak-resin-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_ldwf0mpa4b8_html: The CasiOak Collection is more than a timekeeping device; it's a statement of individuality. Each piece, adorned with bright colors and a rainbow palette, is a canvas of creativity. These watches are not just accessories; they are conversation starters, an extension of your personality. Whether you're in a formal meeting or at a casual gathering, a CasiOak on your wrist says you're not afraid to stand out and make a bold statement.
ecom-casioak-resin-ld-vanilla-block.textcontent_heyz8e0kn6_html:
In the CasiOak Collection, functionality meets fantasy. Each watch is a testament to our commitment to pushing the boundaries of traditional watch design. The fusion of robust G-Shock resilience with our artistic flair results in a collection that's as durable as it is delightful. 

These watches are crafted for the fearless, the dreamers, and the trendsetters – for those who dare to change the narrative of time. With a CasiOak on your wrist, you're not just wearing a watch; you're wearing a piece of art that tells a story – your story.
